messages.content: Here is some information about sign languages worldwide. We include: American Sign Language (ASL), French Sign Language (LSF), Dutch Sign Language (NGT), and Chinese Sign Language (CSL). Provide 2 entries including role and content based on this data in JSONL format.

{"messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "When did Dutch Sign Language become an official language?"}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "13 October 2020."}]}
{"messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "What sign language is ASL most closely related to?"}, {"role": "assistant", "content": "French Sign Language (LSF)."}]}
